description.zh-cn: 中国战国末期思想家，法家思想的代表人物与集大成者。
description.en: A Chinese philosopher of the late Warring States period, who was a representative and synthesizer of the Legalist school.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝丞相，韩非的同学。
description.en: Chancellor of the Qin dynasty and a fellow student of Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期儒家大师，韩非与李斯的老师。
description.en: A Confucian master of the late Warring States period, and the teacher of Han Fei and Li Si.

description.zh-cn: 秦国国君，后为中国第一位皇帝秦始皇。
description.en: King of the state of Qin, who later became the first emperor of China, Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 秦国大臣，与李斯一同诬陷韩非。
description.en: A minister of the state of Qin who, along with Li Si, slandered Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 战国七雄之一，韩非的母国。
description.en: One of the Seven Warring States and the home state of Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 战国七雄之一，后统一中国建立秦朝。
description.en: One of the Seven Warring States, which later unified China and established the Qin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代诸子百家之一，主张以“法”、“术”、“势”治国。
description.en: A school of Chinese philosophy that advocated for governing by law, technique, and power.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的著作集。
description.en: A collection of works by Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 韩非曾拜儒家大师荀子为师。
description.en: Han Fei studied under the Confucian master Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 李斯曾拜儒家大师荀子为师。
description.en: Li Si studied under the Confucian master Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 韩非与李斯一同拜荀子为师，为同学关系。
description.en: Han Fei and Li Si studied under Xunzi together as fellow students.

description.zh-cn: 李斯因嫉妒韩非的才华，向秦王政进谗言导致韩非下狱，并最终在狱中将其毒死。
description.en: Out of jealousy of Han Fei's talent, Li Si slandered him to King Zheng of Qin, leading to Han Fei's imprisonment and eventual death by poison in jail.

description.zh-cn: 姚贾与李斯一同诬陷韩非，导致其下狱。
description.en: Yao Jia joined Li Si in slandering Han Fei, leading to his imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 听信李斯、姚贾谗言，将韩非下狱，导致其最终死亡。
description.en: Heeding the slander of Li Si and Yao Jia, King Zheng of Qin had Han Fei imprisoned, which ultimately led to his death.

description.zh-cn: 秦王政在读到韩非的著作后对其极为欣赏，感叹“寡人假如能够见到这个作者并与他往来，就死而无憾了”。
description.en: After reading Han Fei's works, King Zheng of Qin deeply admired him, remarking, 'If I could but meet this man and befriend him, I would die without regret.'

description.zh-cn: 韩非是法家思想的代表人物和集大成者。
description.en: Han Fei is a representative figure and the synthesizer of the Legalist school of thought.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的思想受商鞅影响。
description.en: Han Fei's thought was influenced by Shang Yang.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的思想受申不害影响。
description.en: Han Fei's thought was influenced by Shen Buhai.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的思想受慎到影响。
description.en: Han Fei's thought was influenced by Shen Dao.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的思想受李悝影响。
description.en: Han Fei's thought was influenced by Li Kui.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的思想受老子影响，并对《道德经》有深入研究。
description.en: Han Fei's thought was influenced by Laozi, and he conducted in-depth research on the Tao Te Ching.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的思想受其老师荀子影响，尤其是在尊君思想方面。
description.en: Han Fei's thought was influenced by his teacher Xunzi, especially regarding the concept of revering the monarch.

description.zh-cn: 韩非将自己的学说追本溯源于黄老之术。
description.en: Han Fei traced the origins of his doctrines back to the Huang-Lao school of thought.

description.zh-cn: 韩非反对儒家建构在私人情感与社会道德提升上的治国主张。
description.en: Han Fei opposed the Confucian approach to governance, which was based on personal emotional bonds and the elevation of social morality.

description.zh-cn: 韩非是《韩非子》的作者。
description.en: Han Fei is the author of the Han Feizi.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子》一书传到秦国，其内容促使秦王政以战争为要挟，逼迫韩非出使秦国。
description.en: The book Han Feizi reached the state of Qin, and its contents prompted King Zheng of Qin to use the threat of war to compel Han Fei to be sent as an envoy to Qin.

description.zh-cn: 在秦国以战争威胁的紧急情况下，派遣韩非出使秦国。
description.en: Under the urgent circumstance of a war threat from Qin, King An of Han dispatched Han Fei as an envoy to Qin.

description.zh-cn: 秦国以战争为要胁，逼迫韩国派韩非出使。
description.en: The state of Qin used the threat of war to compel the state of Han to send Han Fei as an envoy.

description.zh-cn: 韩非作为韩国公子，多次上书韩悼惠王游说，但未被采纳。
description.en: As a prince of Han, Han Fei repeatedly submitted memorials to advise King Daohui of Han, but his advice was not adopted.

description.zh-cn: 韩非作为韩国公子，多次上书韩王安游说，但未被采纳。
description.en: As a prince of Han, Han Fei repeatedly submitted memorials to advise King An of Han, but his advice was not adopted.

description.zh-cn: 韩非曾与堂谿公谈话。
description.en: Han Fei once had a conversation with Tang Xi Gong.

description.zh-cn: 堂谿公曾与公元前333年去世的韩昭侯谈话。
description.en: Tang Xi Gong had a conversation with Marquis Zhao of Han, who died in 333 BCE.
